data.chText: 黑客（秘密窥视或改变他人计算机系统信息）
data.enText: a person who secretly finds a way of looking at and/or changing information on sb else's computer system without permission

means: 黑客(秘密窥视或改变他人计算机系统信息)

tr: one who works hard at boring tasks
a programmer for whom computing is its own reward
may enjoy the challenge of breaking into other computers but does no harm
example: true hackers subscribe to a code of ethics and look down upon crackers

tr: a programmer who breaks into computer systems in order to steal or change or destroy information as a form of cyber-terrorism

value.def: A computer hacker is someone who tries to break into computer systems, especially in order to get secret information.
value.tran: （尤指盗取他人计算机系统中保密信息的）黑客

value.def: A computer hacker is someone who uses a computer a lot, especially so much that they have no time to do anything else.
value.tran: 黑客（指沉迷于电脑之中，无暇顾及其他的电脑迷）
